name: Restful Fast Request - API Buddy
description:
Restful Fast Request is an IDEA plugin similar to Postman that helps developers debug APIs efficiently. It is a powerful restful toolkit(http client) plugin which helps you quickly generate URL and params by the existing method. Plugin = API debug tool + API manager tool + API search tool.

Plugin has a beautiful interface to compose requests, inspect server responses, store your API request and export API request.

The plugin is intended to

✪ Lower barrier to entry into debug API
✪ Boost developer’s productivity
✪ Make sure your api follows best practices

Support framework

★ Spring framework (Spring MVC / Spring Boot)
★ Kotlin + Spring framework
★ JAX-RS

Features

  • Teamwork
  • API navigate tree
  • SearchEveryWhere for api
  • Groovy script support
  • Generate url and parameters in one click
  • Save api
  • Management API
  • Import and export APIs
  • APIs export to Postman
  • API debug support
  • Download file request support
  • Swagger2/Swagger3 annotation default value parameter parsing support
  • Custom parameter parse
  • String generation strategy
  • One click location history save api to method
  • Built-in Json parameter editor
  • Automatically generate descriptions for API fields
  • One click to generate API documentation
  • Single class API list preview
  • Kotlin spring framework support
  • Mybatis + Spring framework support
  • API grouping parameter save support
  • cURL import/export
  • Response html preview
  • History request preview
  • API grouping parameter save support
  • Cookie support
  • Temporary request save support
  • Url suffix support
  • Api doc sync support
  • More

Getting started

  1. Install IntelliJ IDEA
  2. Launch the IDE and open plugin settings
  3. Search for "Restful Fast Request" and click install
  4. Click the fast request icon,Then click the send button, you can send the request for the method
